verses.verse: Then Jonah <S%H3124><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> out of the fish's <S%H1710><s%> belly, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4578><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> I cried <S%H7121><s%> by reason of mine affliction <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6869><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me; out of the belly <S%H4480><s%> <S%H990><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> cried <S%H7768><s%> I, and thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

For thou hadst cast <S%H7993><s%> me into the deep, <S%H4688><s%> in the midst <S%H3824><s%> of the seas; <S%H3220><s%> and the floods <S%H5104><s%> compassed me about: <S%H5437><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy billows <S%H4867><s%> and thy waves <S%H1530><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me.

Then I <S%H589><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I am cast out <S%H1644><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> thy sight; <S%H5869><s%> yet <S%H389><s%> I will look <S%H5027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> compassed me about, <S%H661><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the soul: <S%H5315><s%> the depth <S%H8415><s%> closed me round about, <S%H5437><s%> the weeds <S%H5488><s%> were wrapped <S%H2280><s%> about my head. <S%H7218><s%>

I went down <S%H3381><s%> to the bottoms <S%H7095><s%> of the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with her bars <S%H1280><s%> was about <S%H1157><s%> me forever: <S%H5769><s%> yet hast thou brought up <S%H5927><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from corruption, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7845><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

When my soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me I remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and my prayer <S%H8605><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, into <S%H413><s%> thine holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>
They that observe <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> their own mercy. <S%H2617><s%>

But I <S%H589><s%> will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto thee with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> that that <S%H834><s%> I have vowed. <S%H5087><s%> Salvation <S%H3444><s%> is of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto the fish, <S%H1709><s%> and it vomited out <S%H6958><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jonah <S%H3124><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land.
